knimeNode.name: OMERO Table Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads a table from an OMERO Server

fullDescription.intro: This node allows you to read a table from an OMERO Server.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The TableID of the table to download.

ports.inPort: Connection information for an OMERO server (from OMERO Connection node).
ports.outPort: Table containing the data read from the OMERO Server.
